None.Name: Tainted Strangling
None.Description: Every 10 seconds, tower is able to root a target enemy to the ground for 10 seconds dealing 50 damage every second. Rooted units are immobile but still able to use ranged attacks. After the effect wears off, target is immune against Root for a while. Affects ground targets only.
